GK19bahcar4u:4: vipule 'pi pṛthupratimo danta iva gaṇādhipasya mukhe // 4.2 //
GK19bahcar4u:17: teṣu caivamutpadyamāneṣu krameṇodapādi hūṇahariṇakesarī sindhurājajvaro gūrjaraprajāgaro
GK19bahcar4u:20: yo rājyāṅgasaṅgīnyabhiṣicyamāna eva malānīva mumoca dhanāni /
GK19bahcar4u:21: yaḥ parakīyenāpi kātaravallabhena raṇamukhe tṛṇeneva dhṛtenālajjata jīvitena /
GK19bahcar4u:22: yaḥ karadhṛtadhautāsipratibimbitenātmanāpyadūyata samitiṣu sahāyena ripūṇāṃ puraḥ pradhaneṣu dhanuṣāpi namatā yo mānī mānasenākhidyata /
GK19bahcar4u:24: yaśca sarvāsu dikṣu samīkṛtataṭāvaṭaviṭapāṭavītarutṛṇagulmavalmīkagirigahanairdaṇḍayātrāpathaiḥ pṛthubhirbhṛtyopayogāya vyabhajateva vasudhāṃ bahudhā /
GK19bahcar4u:25: yaṃ cālabdhayuddhadohadamātmoyo 'pi sakalaripusamutsārakaḥ parakīya iva tatāpa pratāpaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:32: yasya cāsanneṣu bhṛtyaratneṣu pratibimbateva tulyarūpā sa ptalakṣyata lakṣmīḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:38: yaśca vairamupāyanaṃ vigrahamanugrahaṃ samarāgamaṃ mahotsavaṃ śatruṃ nidhidarśanamaribāhulyamabhyudayamāhavāhvānaṃ
GK19bahcar4u:47: tasya ca janmāntare 'pi satī pārvatīva śaṅkarasya,
GK19bahcar4u:97: yaśomatī nāma mahādevī prāṇānāṃ praṇayasya visrambhasya dhramasya sukhasya ca bhūmirabhūt /
GK19bahcar4u:99: nisargata eva ca sa nṛpatirādityabhakto babhūva /
GK19bahcar4u:100: pratidinamudaye dinakṛtaḥ snātaḥ sitadukūladhārī dhavalakarpaṭaprāvṛtaśirāḥ prāṅmukhaḥ
GK19bahcar4u:101: kṣitau jānubyāṃ sthitvā kuṅkumapaṅkānulipte maṇḍalake pavitrapajharāgapātrīnihitena
GK19bahcar4u:103: ajapacca japyaṃ sucaritaḥ pratyuṣasi madhyandine dinānte cāpatyahetoḥ prādhvaṃ prayatena manasā jañjapūko mantramādityahṛdayam /
GK19bahcar4u:105: yataḥ sarājā kadācid grīṣmasamaye yadṛcchayā sitakarakarasitasudhādhavalasya harmyasya pṛṣṭe suṣvāpa /
GK19bahcar4u:106: vāmapārśve cāsya dvitīyaśayane devī yaśomatī śiśye /
GK19bahcar4u:111: rājani ca vimalanavapratibimbitābhiḥ saṃvāhyamānacaraṇa iva tārakābhiḥ visrabdhaprasāritairdigaṅganānāmivārpitairaṅgairmadhusugandhibhiḥ
GK19bahcar4u:115: paritrāyasva paritrāyasva' iti bhāṣamāṇā bhūṣaṇaraveṇa vyāharantīva parijanamutkampamānāṅgayaṣṭirudatiṣṭhat /
GK19bahcar4u:116: atha tena sarvasyāmapi pṛthivyāmaśrutapūrveṇa kimuta devīmukhe paritrāyasveti dhvaninā dagdha iva śravaṇayorekapada eva nidrāṃ tatyāja rājā
GK19bahcar4u:117: śirobhāgācca kopakampamānadakṣiṇakarākṛṣṭena karṇotpaleneva nirgacchatācchadhāreṇa dhautāsinā sīmantayanniva niśām,
GK19bahcar4u:119: karavikṣepavegagalitena hṛdayeneva bhayanimittānveṣiṇā bhramatā dikṣu kanakavalayena virājamānaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:121: puraḥ patitenāsidhārāgocaragatena śaśimayūkhakhaṇḍeneva khaṇḍitena hāreṇa rājamānaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:123: baddhāndhakārayā tripatākayā bhrukuṭyā punariva triyāmāṃ parivartayan “devi/
GK19bahcar4u:124: na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyam' ityabhidadhāno vegenotpapāta /
GK19bahcar4u:125: sarvāsu ca dikṣu vikṣiptacakṣuryadā nādrākṣītkiñcidapi tadā papraccha tāṃ bhayakāraṇam /
GK19bahcar4u:128: śānte ca hṛdayotkampakāriṇi sādhvase sā samabhāṣata--“āryaputra/
GK19bahcar4u:129: jānāmi svapne bhagavataḥ saviturmaṇḍalānnirgatya dvau kumārakau,
GK19bahcar4u:142: tau ca me vilapantyāḥ śastreṇodaraṃ vidārya praveṣṭumārabdhau /
GK19bahcar4u:145: etasminneva ca kālakrame rājalakṣmyāḥ prathamālāpaḥ prathayanniva svapnaphalamupatoraṇaṃ rarāṇa prabhātaśaṅkhaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:149: puruṣaśca vallabhaturaṅgamandurāmandire mandamandaṃ suptotthitaḥ saptīnāṃ kṛtamadhuraheṣāravāṇāṃ
GK19bahcar4u:164: tataḥ samatikrānte kasmiṃścitkālāṃśe devyāṃ ca yaśomatyāṃ devo rājyavardhanaḥ prathamameva saṃbabhūva garbhe /
GK19bahcar4u:165: garbhasthitasyaiva ca yasya yaśaseva pāṇḍutāmādata jananī /
GK19bahcar4u:168: śanaiḥ śanairupacīyamānagarbhamarālasā ca gurubhirvāritāpi vandanāya kayamapi sakhībhirhastāvalambenānīyata /
GK19bahcar4u:178: āstāṃ nūpurabhārakheditaṃ caraṇayugalaṃ manasāpi nodasahata saudhamāroḍhum /
GK19bahcar4u:182: divasaṃ cādhomukhī stanapṛṣṭhasaṃkrāntenāpatyadarśanautsukyādantaḥ praviṣṭeneva mukhakamalenaivaṃ prīyamāṇā dadarśa garbham /
GK19bahcar4u:183: udare tanayena hṛdaye ca bharvā tiṣṭhatā dviguṇitāmiva lakṣmīmuvāha /
GK19bahcar4u:184: sakhyutsaṅgamuktaśarīrā ca śarīraparicārikāṇāmaṅkeṣu sapatnīnāṃ tu śiraḥsu pādau cakāra /
GK19bahcar4u:185: avatīrṇe ca daśame māsi sarvorvībhṛtpakṣapātāya vajraparamāṇubiriva nirmitam,
GK19bahcar4u:188: yasmiṃśca jāte jātapramodā nṛtyamayya ivājāyanta prajāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:192: stambitatāmarase vikasitacātakacetasi mūkamānasaukasi nabhasi māsi devyā devakyā
GK19bahcar4u:193: iva cakrapāṇiryaśomatyā hṛdaye garbhe ca samameva saṃbabhūva harṣaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:195: garbhārambheṇa śyāmāyamānacārucūcukacūliko cakravartinaḥ pātuṃ mudritāviva payodharakalaśau babhāroraḥsthaleva /
GK19bahcar4u:198: marndaṃ-mandaṃ saṃcarantyā nirmalamaṇikuṭṭimanimagnapratibimbanibhena gṛhīta pādapallavā pūrvasevāmivārebhe pṛtivyasyāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:200: kṣapāsu saudhaśikharāgragatāyā garbhonmāthamaktāṃśuke stanamaṇḍale saṃkrāntamuḍupatimaṇḍalamupari garbhasya śvetātapatramiva kenāpi dhāryamāṇamadṛśyata
GK19bahcar4u:205: api ca caturṇāmapi mahārṇavānāmekīkṛtenāmbhasā snātuṃ vāñchā babhūva /
GK19bahcar4u:208: saṃnihiteṣvapi maṇidarpaṇeṣu mukhamutkhāte khaḍāgapaṭṭe vīkṣituṃ vyasanamāsīt /
GK19bahcar4u:215: ātmocitasthānaniṣaṇṇāśca mahānto vividhauṣadhidharā bhiṣajo bhūdharā iva bhuvo dhṛtiṃ cakruḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:216: payonidhīnāṃ hṛdayānīva lakṣmyā sahāgatāni grīvāsūtragranthiṣu praśastaratnānyabadhyatta /
GK19bahcar4u:217: tataśca prāpte jyeṣṭhāmūlīye māsi bahulāsu bahulapakṣadvādasyāṃ vyatīte pradoṣasamaye samārurukṣati kṣapāyauvane sahasaivāntaḥpure samudapādi kolāhalaḥ strījanasya /
GK19bahcar4u:218: nirgatya ca saṃbhramaṃ yaśovatyāḥ svayameva hṛdayanirviśeṣā dhātryāḥ sutā supātreti nāmnā rājñaḥ pādayornipatya “deva /
GK19bahcar4u:219: diṣṭyā vardhase dvitīyasutajanmanā' iti vyāharantī pūrṇapātraṃ jahāra /
GK19bahcar4u:220: asminneva ca kāle rājñaḥ paramasaṃmataḥ śataśaḥ saṃvāditātīndriyādeśaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:223: sakalagaṇakamadhye mahito hitaśca trikālajñānabhāgbhojakastārako nāma gaṇakaḥ samupasṛtya vijñāpitavān--“deva/
GK19bahcar4u:224: śrūyate māndhātā kilaivaṃvidhe vyatīpātādisarvadoṣābhiṣaṅgharahite 'hani sarveṣūccasthānasthiteṣvevaṃ graheṣvīdṛśi lagne bheje janma /
GK19bahcar4u:225: arvāktato 'sminnantarāle punarevaṃvidhe yoge cakravarttijanane nājani jagati kaścidaparaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:226: saptānāṃ cakravartināmagraṇariścakravarticihnānāṃ mahāratnānāṃ ca bhājanaṃ saptānāṃ
GK19bahcar4u:227: sāgarāṇāṃ pālayitā saptatantūnāṃ sarveṣāṃ pravartayitā saptasaptisamaḥ suto 'yaṃ
GK19bahcar4u:229: atrāntare svayamevānādmātā api tāramadhuraṃ śahkhā viresuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:235: vavau cācirāccakrāyudhamutsṛjantyā lakṣmyā niśvāsa iva surāmodasurabhirdivyānilaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:239: prahatamaṅgalatūryapratiśabdanibhena dikṣu dikpālairapi pramoda dakriyatena diṣṭavṛddhikalakalaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:240: tatkṣaṇa eva ca śuklavāsaso brahnamukhāḥ kṛtayugaprajāpatayaiva prajāvṛddheye samupatasthire dvijātayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:243: pralambaśmaśrujālajaṭilānanāni bahalamalapaṅkakalaṅkakālakāyāni naśyataḥ kalikālasya bāndhavakulānīvākulānyadhāvanta muktāni bandhanavṛndāni
GK19bahcar4u:258: sindūrapātrāṇi ca piṣṭātakapātrāṇi ca bālalatālambamānaviṭakavīṭakāṃśca tāmbūlavṛkṣakān
GK19bahcar4u:270: sanandanavana iva pārijātakāmodaiḥ sanīhāra iva karpūrareṇubhiḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:330: kāścitkaṇṭhanihitakāñcanakāñcīguṇāñcitakañcukivikārākuñcitabruvaḥ kāmavāgurā iva prasāritabāhupāśā rājamahiṣyaḥ prārabdhanṛttā vilesuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:331: sarvataśca nṛtyataḥ streṇasya galadabhiḥ pādālaktakairaruṇitā rāgamayīva śuśoṇa kṣoṇī /
GK19bahcar4u:335: cañcalānāṃ cakṣuṣāmaṃ śubhiḥ kṛṣṇasāramayā ivāsan vāsarāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:338: utkṣiptairhastakisalayaiḥ kamalinīmayya iva babhāsire sṛṣṭayaḥ māṇikyendrāyudhānāmarciṣā cārṣipatramayā iva cakāśire ravimarīcayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:339: raṇatāmābharaṇagaṇānāṃ pratiśabdakaiḥ kiṅkiṇīmayya iva śiśiñjire diśaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:345: diśi diśi kuberakoṣā ivālupyanta lokena draviṇarāśayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:361: ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣamavatarati ca rājyavardhane devī yaśomatī garbheṇādhatta nārāyaṇamūrtiriva vasudhāṃ devīṃ rājyaśriyam /
GK19bahcar4u:370: yayā dvayoḥ sutayorapi stanayorivaikāvalīlatayā nitarāmarājata jananī /
GK19bahcar4u:371: arimanneva tu kāle devyā yaśomatyā bhrātā sutamaṣṭavarṣadeśīyamudbhūyamānakuṭilakākapakṣakaśikhaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaparaśuhuṅkārāgnidhūmalekhānubaddhamūrdhānaṃ makaradhvajamiva punarjātam,
GK19bahcar4u:372: ekenendranīlakuṇḍalāśuśyāmalitena śarīrārdhenetareṇa ca trikaṇṭakamuktāphalālokadhavalitena saṃpṛttāvatāramiva hariharayordarśayantam,
GK19bahcar4u:375: śaiśave 'pi savāṣṭambhaṃ bījamiva voryadramasya bhaṇḍināmānamanucaraṃ kumārayorarpitavān /
GK19bahcar4u:376: avanipatestu tasyopari putrayostṛtīyasya netrayoriveśvarasya tulyaṃ darśanamāsīt /
GK19bahcar4u:377: rājaputrāvapi sakalajīvalokahṛdayānādadāyinī tena prakṛtidakṣiṇena madhumādhavāviva malayamārutenopetau nitarāṃ rejatuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:378: krameṇacāpareṇeva bhrātrā prajānandena saha vardhamānau yauvanamavateratuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:379: sthirorustambhau ca pṛthuprakoṣṭhau dīrghabhujārgalau vikaṭoraḥkavāṭau prāṃśuśālābhirāmau mahānagarasaṃniveśāviva sarvalokāśrayakṣamau babhūvatuḥ
GK19bahcar4u:410: iti harṣa iti sarvasyāmeva pṛthivyāmāvirbhūtaśabdaprādurbhāvau svalpīyasaiva kālena
GK19bahcar4u:412: ekadā ca tāvāhūya bhuktavānabhyantaragataḥ pitā sasnehamavādīt--“vatsau/
GK19bahcar4u:415: prāyeṇa paramāṇava iva samavāyeṣvanuguṇībhūya dravyaṃ kurvanti pārthivaṃ kṣudrāḥ krīḍārasena nartayantatau mayūratāṃ nayanti bāliśāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:419: cātakā iva tṛṣṇāvanto na śakyante grahītumakulīnāḥ mānase mīnamiva sphurantamevābhiprāyaṃ gṛhṇanti jālikāḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:422: yataḥ sarvairebhirdeṣābhiṣaṅgairasaṃgatau babhudhaipadhābhiḥ parīkṣitau śucī vinītau
GK19bahcar4u:423: vikrāntāvabhirūpau mālavarājaputrau bhrātarau bujāviva me śarīrādavyatiriktau kumāraguptamādhavaguptanāmānāvasmābhirbhavatoranucaratvārthamimau nirdiṣṭau /
GK19bahcar4u:426: na cirād dvāradeśanihitalocanau rājyavardhanaharṣau pratīhāreṇa saha praviśantam,
GK19bahcar4u:427: agrato jyeṣṭhamaṣṭādaśavarṣavayasaṃ nātyuccaṃ nātikharvamatigurubhiḥ padanyāsairanekanarapatisaṃcaraṇacalāṃ niścalīkurvāṇamivorvīm,
GK19bahcar4u:435: acapalāstamitatārakeṇādhomukhena cakṣuṣā śikṣayantamiva lakṣmīlābhottānitamukhāni paṅkajavanāni vinayam,
GK19bahcar4u:443: pṛṣṭhatastasya kanīyāṃsamatiprāṃśutayā gauratayā ca manaḥ śilāśelamiva saṃcarantam,
GK19bahcar4u:444: anulbaṇamālatīkusumaśekharanibhena nirjigamiṣatā guruṇa śirasi cumbitamiva yaśasā,
GK19bahcar4u:446: atidhīratayā hṛdayanihitā svāmibhaktimiva niścalāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ dhārayantam,
GK19bahcar4u:447: acchācchacandanarasānulepanaśītalaṃ saṃnihitahāropadhānaṃ vakṣaḥsthalamanantasāmantasaṃkrānti śrāntāyāḥ śriyo viśālaṃ śaśimaṇiśilāpaṭṭaśayanamiva
GK19bahcar4u:448: cakṣuḥ kuraṅgakairghoṇāvaṃśaṃ varāhauḥ skandhapīṭhaṃ mahiṣaiḥ prakoṣṭhabandhaṃ vyāghraiḥ
GK19bahcar4u:451: praviśya ca tau dūrādeva caturbhirahgairuttamāṅgena ca gāṃ spṛśantau namaścakratuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:453: muhūrtaṃ ca sthitvā bhūpatirādideśa tau--“adyaprabhṛti bhavadbhyāṃ kumārāvanuvartanīyau' iti /
GK19bahcar4u:454: “yathājñāpayati devaḥ' iti medinīdo lāyamānamaulibhyāmutthāya rājyavradhanaharṣau praṇematuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:456: tataścārabhya kṣaṇamapi nimeṣonmeṣāviva cakṣurgocarādanapayāntāvucchvāsaniḥśvāsāviva naktandivamabhimukhasthitau bhujāviva satatapārśvavartinau kumārayostau babhūvatuḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:457: atha rājyaśrīrapi nṛttagītādiṣu vidagdhāsu sakhīṣu sakalāsu kalāsu ca pratidivasamupacīyamānaparicayā śanaiḥ śanairavardhata /
GK19bahcar4u:459: nipeturekasyāṃ tasyāṃ śarā iva lakṣyabhuvi bhūbhujāṃ sarveṣāṃ dṛṣaśṭayaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:461: kadācittu rājāntaḥpuraprasādasthito bāhyakakṣyāvasthitena puruṣeṇa svaprastāvāgatāṃ gīyamānāmāryāmaśṛṇot--
GK19bahcar4u:464: tāṃ ca śrutvā pārśvasthitāṃ mahādevīmutsāritaparijano jagāda--“devi/
GK19bahcar4u:466: etadīyā guṇavatteva kṣaṇamapi hṛdayānnāpayāti me cintā /
GK19bahcar4u:467: yauvanārambha eva ca kanyakānābhindhanībhavanti pitaraḥ saṃtāpānalasya /
GK19bahcar4u:469: kenāpi kṛtā dharmyā nābhimatā me sthitireyaṃ yadaṅgasaṃbhūtānyaṅkalālitānyaparityājyānyapatyakānyakāṇḍa evāgatyāsaṃstutairnīyante /
GK19bahcar4u:471: seyaṃ sarvābhibhāvinī śokāgnedahiśaktiryadapatyatve samāne 'pi jātāyāṃ duhitari dūyante santaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:472: etadrathaṃ janmakāla eva kanyakābhyaḥ prayacchanti salilamaśrubiḥ sādhavaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:474: ko hi nāma saheta sacetano virahamapatyānām /
GK19bahcar4u:475: yathā yathā samāpatanti dūtā varāṇāṃ varākī lajjamāneva cintā tathā tathā nitarāṃ praviśati mehṛdayam /
GK19bahcar4u:479: dharaṇīdharāṇāṃ ca mūrdhni sthito māheśvarā pādanyāsa iva sakalabhuvananamaskṛto maukharo vaṃśaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:480: tatrāpi tilakabhūtasyāvantivarmaṇaḥ sūnuragrajo grahavarmā nāma grahapatiriva gāṃ gataḥ pituranyūno guṇairenāṃ prārthayate /
GK19bahcar4u:481: yadi bhavatyā api matiranumanyate tatastasmai dātumicchāmi' ityuktavati bhartari duhitṛsnehakātaratarahadayā sāśrulocanā mahādevī pratyuvāca--āryaputra/
GK19bahcar4u:482: saṃvardhanamātropayoginyo dhātrīnirviśeṣā bhavanti khalu mātaraḥ kanyakānām /
GK19bahcar4u:485: yathā neyaṃ yāvajjavīvamāvayorārgitāṃ prati padyate tathāryaputra eva jānāti' iti /
GK19bahcar4u:486: rājā tu jātaniścayo duhitṛdānaṃ prati samāhūya sutāvapi viditārthāvakārṣīt /
GK19bahcar4u:487: śobhate ca divase grahavarmaṇā kanyāṃ prārthayituṃ preṣitasya pūrvāgatasyaiva pradhānadūtapuruṣasya kare sarvarājakulasamakṣaṃ duhitṛdānalalamapātayat
GK19bahcar4u:488: jātamudi kṛtārthe gate ca tasminnāsanneṣu ca vivāhadivaseṣūddāmadīyamānatāmbūlapaṭavāsakusumaprasādhitasarvalokam,
GK19bahcar4u:509: āsūryodayācca praviṣṭābhiḥ satībhiḥ subhagābhiḥ surūpābhiḥ suveśābhiravidha vābhiḥ
GK19bahcar4u:524: stambhairujjvalaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ cautsukyadaṃ ca maṅgalyaṃ cāsīdrājakulam /
GK19bahcar4u:525: devī tu yaśomatī vivāhotsavaparyākulahṛdayā hṛdayena bhartari,
GK19bahcar4u:534: bhūpatirapyuparyupari visarjitoṣṭravāmījanitajāmātṛjoṣaḥ satyapyājñāsaṃpādanadakṣe mukhekṣaṇapare parijane samaṃ putrābhyāṃ duhitṛsnehavivalavaḥ sarvaṃ svayamakarot /
GK19bahcar4u:535: evaṃ ca tasminnavidhavāmaya iva bhavati rājakule,
GK19bahcar4u:542: lakṣmīmaya iva vijṛmbhamāṇe mahotsave nidhāna iva sukhasya,
GK19bahcar4u:543: phala iva janmanaḥ pariṇāma iva puṇyasya,
GK19bahcar4u:555: jāmāturantikāttāmbūladāyakaḥ pārijātakanāmā saṃptāptaḥ' ityabhidhāya svākāraṃ yuvānamadarśayat /
GK19bahcar4u:559: asau tu samākarmitanarādhipadhvanirdhāvamānaḥ katicitpadānyupasṛtya prasārya ca bāhū sevācaturaściraṃ vasuṃdharāyāṃ nirdhāya mūrdhānamutthāya
GK19bahcar4u:560: kuśalau yathājñāpayasyarcayati ca devaṃ namaskāreṇa' iti vyajñāpayat /
GK19bahcar4u:561: āgatajāmātṛnivedanāgataṃ ca taṃ jñātvā kṛtasatkāraṃ rājā “yāminyāḥ prathame yāme vivāhakālātyayakṛto yathā na bhavati doṣaḥ' iti saṃdiśya pratīpaṃ prāhiṇot /
GK19bahcar4u:562: atha sakalakamalavanalakṣmīṃ vadhūmukha iva saṃcārya samavasite vāsare,
GK19bahcar4u:565: saubhāgyadhvaja iva raktāṃ śukasukumāravapuṣi nabhasi sphurati saṃdhyārāge,
GK19bahcar4u:567: lagnasaṃpādanasajja ivojjihāne jyotirgaṇe vivāhamahgalakalaśa ivodayaśikhariṇā samutkṣipyamāṇe vardhamānadhavalacchāye tārādhipamaṇḍale,
GK19bahcar4u:572: calakarṇacāmarāṇāṃ cāmīkaramaya sarvopakaraṇānāṃ varṇakalambināṃ balināṃ ghaṇṭāṭāṅkāriṇāṃ kariṇāṃ ghaṭābhiḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:574: nakṣatramālāmaṇḍitamukhīṃ kariṇariṃ niśākara iva paurandarīṃ diśamārūḍhaḥ,
GK19bahcar4u:579: kusumasaurabhagarvabhrāntabhramarakulakalakalapralāpasubhagaḥ pārijāta iva jātaḥ śriyā saha punaravatārito medinīm,
GK19bahcar4u:580: navavadhūvadanāvalokanakutūhaleneva kṛṣyamāṇahṛdayaḥ patanniva mukhena pratyāsannalagno grahavarmā /
GK19bahcar4u:581: rājā tu tamupadvāramāgataṃ caraṇābhyāmeva rājacakrānugamyamānaḥ sasutaḥ pratyujjagāma /
GK19bahcar4u:582: avatīrṇaṃ ca taṃ kṛtanamaskāraṃ manmathamiva mādhavaḥ prasāritabhujo gāḍhamāliliṅga /
GK19bahcar4u:583: yathākramaṃ pariṣvaktarājyavardhanaharṣaṃ ca haste gṛhītvābhyantaraṃ ninye /
GK19bahcar4u:585: na cirācca gambhīranāmā nṛpateḥ praṇayī vidvāndvijanamā grahavarmāṇamuvāca--“tāta/
GK19bahcar4u:586: tvāṃ prāpya cirātkhalu rājyaśriyā ghaṭitau tejomayau sakalajagadgoyamānabudhakarṇānandakāriguṇagaṇau somasūryavaṃśāviva puṣyabhūtimukaravaṃśau
GK19bahcar4u:587: prathamameva kaustubhamaṇiriva guṇaiḥ sthito 'si hṛdaye devasya /
GK19bahcar4u:588: idānīṃ tu śaśīva sirasā parameśvareṇāsi voḍhavyo jātaḥ' iti /
GK19bahcar4u:593: gaccha' iti gadito grahavarmā praviśyānta puraṃ jāmātṛdarśanakutūhalinīnāṃ strīṇāṃ patitāni locanasahasrāṇi vikacanīlakuvalayavanānīva laṅghayannāsasāda kautukagṛhadvāram /
GK19bahcar4u:596: aruṇāṃśukāvaguṇṭhitamukhīṃ prabātasaṃdhyāmiva svaprabhayā niṣprabhānpradīpakānkurvāṇām atisaukumāryaśaṅkiteneva yauvanena nātinirbharamupagūḍhām,
GK19bahcar4u:605: prabhālāvaṇyamadasaurabhamādhuryaiḥ kaustubhaśaśimadirāpārijātāmṛtaprabhavaiḥ sarvaratnaguṇairaparāṇiva surāsurasṣā ratnākareṇa kalpitāṃ śriyam,
GK19bahcar4u:606: snigdhena bālikālokena sitasiraṇamarakataprabhāharitaśādvalena kapolasthalītalena vinodayantīmiva hāriṇīṃ locanacchāyām,
GK19bahcar4u:607: adhomukhaṃ varakautukālokanākulaṃ muhurmuhuḥ kutamukhannamanaprayatnaṃ sakhījanaṃ hṛdayaṃ ca nirbhartsayantī vadhūmapaśyat /
GK19bahcar4u:608: praviśantameva taṃ hṛdayacauraṃ vadhvā samarpitaṃ jagrāha kandarpaḥ /
GK19bahcar4u:609: parihāsasmeramkhībiśca nārībhiḥ kautukagṛhe yadyatkāryate jāmatātā tattatsarvamatipeśalaṃ cakāra /
GK19bahcar4u:610: kṛtapariṇayānurūpaveśaparigrahāṃ gṛhītvā kare vadhūṃ nirjagāma jagāma ca navasudhādhavalā nimantritāgataistuṣāraśailopatyakāmiva tryambakāmbikāvivāhāhūtairbhūbhṛdbhiḥ
GK19bahcar4u:615: āruroha ca tāṃ divamiva sajyotsnaḥ śaśī /
GK19bahcar4u:616: samutsasarpa ca vellitāruṇaśikhāpallavasya śikhinaḥ kusumāyudha iva ratidvitīyo raktāśokasya samīpam /
GK19bahcar4u:617: hute ca hutabhuji pradakṣiṇāvartapravṛttābhirvadhūvadanavilokanakutūhalinībhiriva jvālābhireva saha pradakṣiṇaṃ babhrāma /
GK19bahcar4u:621: parisamāpitavaivāhikakriyākalāpastu jāmātā vadhvā smaṃ praṇanāma śvaśurau /
GK19bahcar4u:627: sākṣāllakṣmyevoddaṇḍapuṇḍarīkahastayā sanāthena sopadhānena svāstīrṇena śayanena śobhamānam,
GK19bahcar4u:628: śayanasirobhāgasthitena ca kṛtakumudaśobhena kusumāyudhasāhāyakāyāgatena śaśineva nidrākalaśena rājatena virājamānaṃ vāsagṛham /
GK19bahcar4u:629: tatra ca hrītāyā navavadhūkāyāḥ parāṅmukhaprasuptāyā maṇibhittidarpaṇeṣu mukhapratibimbāni
GK19bahcar4u:631: sthitvā ca śvaśurakule śīlenāmṛtamiva śvaśrūhṛdaye varṣannabhinavābhinavopacārairapunaruktānyānandamayāni daśa dināni,
GK19bahcar4u:632: dattvā ca rājadauvārikamiva rājakule raṇaraṇakaṃ yautakaniveditānīva śambalānyādāya hṛdayāni sarvalarokasya kathaṅkathamapi visarjito nṛpeṇa vadhvā saha svadeśamagamaditi /
GK19bahcar4u:633: iti śrīmahākavibāṇamaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite cakravartijanmavarṇanaṃ nāma caturtha ucchvāsaḥ/
